hadith.text: It was narrated that 'Amr bin Murrah said:"I heard Abu Wa'il say: "A man said in the presence of Abdullah: 'I recited Al-Mufassal in one rak'ah.' He said: 'That is like reciting poetry. I know the similar surahs that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to recite together.' And he mentioned twenty surahs from Al-Mufassal, two by two in each rak'ah
